entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
